name: Defend Humans
description:
See my comment for the updated known bugs and how to download the game!


Two known bugs: Hover mouse at 2 o'clock angle a bit of distance on main menu and two or three o'clock on pause menu to press the buttons.

While there is a respawn system, you must play the game without dying once as the level teleport will not work if you die and respawn.  The game is not hard so this shouldn't be a problem.  If you die then just restart the game, sorry for the inconvenience.

Thanks for playing!

Also, this does not support Mac.  I fully acknowledge that this means I am not competing if this disqualifies me, but I wanted to go ahead and submit it anyway, even if it cannot compete.  Thanks!

Also, attributions (forgot that I should've done this before)

Voice actor for the squeaky evil scientist:  Discord: FoxSpeaks#7004

Voice actor for APCAI, the protagonist, yes, the boring one: myself.
